original_text: God had already caused the officer to like Daniel and to be kind to him.
korean_text: 하나님이 다니엘로 하여금 환관장에게 은혜와 긍휼을 얻게 하신지라

sentences.original_text: God had already caused the officer
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님은 이미 그 관원에게 그렇게 하도록 하셨습니다

sentences.original_text: and to be kind to him
